Stat 7, Fall 2022

Published Sep 23, 2022
Sunrise at Natural Bridges.

This page is for students in my discussion sections & also for students taking the class generally.

Important: This class moves SUPER quickly. In order to do well, I recommend that you read ahead of time and stay on top of things throughout the quarter.

NOTE: This quarter was disrupted due to the UC ASE, SR, Postdoc strike.

Guides

More relevant for the finals:

  • Final Exam Practice: Regression Practice Problem (solutions attached)
  • Finals Review Slides
  • Guide to Difference of Two Proportions & Goodness of Fit Test
  • Guide to Hypothesis Testing
  • How to use Tables to Look up Probabilities (from Open Intro)

Older stuff:

  • Normal Approximation to the Binomial
  • Guide to Discrete Random Variables
  • Probability Basics
  • Guide to free response questions (for a previous course but should be relevant here).

  • Week 6: Sample Mean, CLT, Estimation, Confidence Intervals
  • Week 7: Hypothesis Testing pt. 1
